hampHill.name: Hampton Hills
hampHill.tweet: Trails are now OPEN! Some puddling remains, please ride through. Try mountain biking this weekend!

royalView.name: Royalview
royalView.tweet: Royalview MTB Trails are closed Friday 6/10/22

OECR.name: Ohio & Erie Canal Reservation
OECR.tweet: Ohio & Erie Canal flow trails are closed today due to rainfall 6/7

vulturesKnob.name: Vultures Knob
vulturesKnob.tweet: 5/28 Trail Status: OPEN - but use caution ⚠️ We have a tree down for sure after Suspension Bridge. Hopefully nothing too muddy. Use your best judgement. https://t.co/zZ1s9RycBE
